content: is there such a thing as  CalDAV VTODO web client as SPA?

Yes, there are CalDAV VTODO web clients available that are built as Single Page Applications (SPA). These web clients offer a modern and interactive user interface and utilize technologies like JavaScript frameworks (such as Vue.js, React.js, or Angular) to provide a dynamic user experience. Some examples of CalDAV VTODO web clients implemented as SPAs include "Nextcloud Calendar," "OpenTasks," and "Radicale." These applications allow users to manage their tasks and to-do lists using CalDAV standard through a web-based interface.
